body.p:
Harrodsburg Ky
Nov 18 1861.
Hon B MaGoffin
Dear Sir

Enclosed I send you the petitions of Nimrod Harris & others signed by several Citizens of our town desiring an interposition of your Executive clemency in their behalf -- Should you in your wisdom see fit to grant the prayer of the same you will confer upon the petitioners a favor that will be greatfully remembered by them.
